original: 14.31. Sappītikadukādi🔽Sappītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa ppītikam dhammam paṭicca na sa ppītikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The Pairs Section🔽With happiness as condition: a state without happiness arises. …

original: Appītikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: appītikam dhammam paṭicca na appītikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a state without happiness as condition: a state without happiness arises. …

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
translated: With a cause as condition: nine. … With a prenascence as condition: six. … With a non-disappearance as condition: nine.🔽With a state accompanied by happiness as condition: a state not accompanied by happiness arises. …

original: Pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Napītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  na pīti sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na pīti sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a state not accompanied by happiness as condition: a state not accompanied by happiness arises. …

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.🔽Sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava  sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With a cause as condition: nine. … With a prenascence as condition: six. … With a non-disappearance as condition: nine.🔽With a state accompanied by pleasure as condition: a state not accompanied by pleasure arises. …

original: Nasukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sukha sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na sukha sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a state not accompanied by pleasure as condition: a state not accompanied by pleasure arises. …

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.🔽Upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava  upekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With nine as root cause … With six as prenascence … With nine as non-adverting.🔽With a neutral feeling mind-object …

original: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupekkhā sahagatam dhammam paṭicca na na aupekkhā sahagataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane cha pe avigate nava
translated: With nine as root cause … With six as prenascence … With nine as non-adverting.
